actions.name: Create banner advert
actions.description: Create a banner advert with a given size and identifier
actions.display_text: Create banner advert [b]{0}[/b] size: [b]{1}[/b] position: [b]{3}[/b] show: [b]{2}[/b] reload: [b]{4}[/b] offset: [b]{5}[/b] overlap: [b]{6}[/b]

params.name: Banner Size
params.description: The display size of the advert

params.description: Automatically show the advert once it has loaded

params.description: The AdMob Advert Unit ID for this advert

params.description: Position on the screen where the banner should be placed

params.name: Reload
params.description: Reload the banner with new setting if one already exists

params.name: Offset
params.description: Offset the banner by the specified amount. Ignored when 'Overlap' is 'false'

params.name: Overlap
params.description: Should the banner overlap the main content or not
